content:
#13045 backported some deprecation fixes, and in two places added set_option linter.deprecated false where I couldn't immediately sort out how to use the new function.

Johan asked that I add #adaptation_note at those two places in his delegation. I disagreed on the basis this had nothing to do with v4.9.0 except that the warning, that should have been generated all along, would actually be generated.

My take is that set_option linter.deprecated is sufficient flag for this sort of defect, and there's no need for an additional #adaptation_note, which should be about changes in Lean.

Disagreements, if any, can go here, and I'll update files as necessary!
Ok, fair enough. In that case please merge
(Or give me 15mins to get to a laptop with github)
